Stage Ic will begin when new development in digital equipment (PCM, TDM, PSK and later, coding equipment) is introduced into the system and the analog system is converted to a digital system. FDMA will still be used to the satellite. The intro足 duction of digital operation will result in increased system capacity through a more efficient combination of different types of traffic (voice, TTY, secure voice, data, and wideband data) than is possible in an analog system, and through the use of coding, which allows more efficient use of satellite power. As the time division multiplex (TDM) and pulse code modulation (PCM) equipment becomes available, the system will phase from an analog system to a hybrid, and finally into a digital system.
